TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RibbonCheckBox extends System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox
.class public auto ansi RibbonCheckBox extends System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox

summary.span: 表示在 控件中使用的复选框。

span.span: Represents a check box that is used in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了 大、中、小变体中的控件的示例，以及没有图像的控件的示例。The following illustration shows examples of controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images. ![功能区复选框控件](~/add/media/wpfribbon-checkbox.png "功能区复选框控件")![Ribbon check box controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-checkbox.png "Ribbon check box controls") 功能区复选框控件Ribbon check box controls 下图显示了 所选控件的示例。The following illustration shows examples of controls that are selected. ![选定的功能区复选框控件](~/add/media/wpfribbon-checkbox-selection.png "选定的功能区复选框控件")![Ribbon check box controls that are selected](~/add/media/wpfribbon-checkbox-selection.png "Ribbon check box controls that are selected") 选定的功能区复选框控件Ribbon check box controls that are selected ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 使用大图像、小图像和标签创建控件的标记。The following example shows the markup to create a control with a large image, a small image, and a label. 设置 属性将添加与此复选框对齐的文本。Setting the property adds text that is aligned with the check box. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonCheckBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribboncheckbox)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 控件的键盘快捷键。

span.span: The keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 已注册的默认值为 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅 [Dependency Property Value Precedence（依赖项属性值优先级）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须为1到3个大写字符，不能包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器"，用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时，将在上显示键提示 。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 为 路由事件提供类处理，以防止控件接收键盘焦点。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event to prevent the control from receiving keyboard focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应从应用程序获取键盘焦点。The should not take keyboard focus from the application. 此方法将重写默认行为，并暂时将 属性设置为 `false` ，这会阻止控件获取键盘焦点。This method overrides the default behavior and temporarily sets the property to `false`, which prevents the control from taking keyboard focus. 然后，它调用基方法。It then calls the base method. 此实现不会更改 事件数据的属性) 的已处理状态 ( 。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每个功能区控件继承一个 属性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果设置了该 属性，则不会显示功能区的增强工具提示，将改为显示标准工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon's enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建增强工具提示的标记。The following example shows the markup used to create the enhanced ToolTip. ![增强的工具提示功能](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "增强的工具提示功能")![Enhanced ToolTip](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "Enhanced ToolTip") 增强的工具提示功能Enhanced ToolTip [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonCheckBoxTT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribboncheckboxtt)]
